Name: cement production, CEM II/A-V | cement, CEM II/A-V | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster
Description: In South Africa, all cement production is through dry kiln process. The clinker is ground in mills with gypsum (5%) and depending on the type of cement and technical standard (SAN 50197-1) with other materials such as blast furnace slag, fly ash, pozzolan and lime fillers to produce the Portland cement.
